translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひどい話ですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's a terrible story..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、そういうアルカリアだって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, even Arcaria, you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確か夜盗に捕らえられて、絶対服従魔法で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was captured by night thieves and under absolute obedience magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家族全員夜盗の奴隷にされたって聞いたけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard her entire family was made slaves to the night thieves."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、うん、辛かったよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, yes, it was really tough—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「命令で父が母を殴らされてたりその逆があったり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By order, my father was made to hit my mother, and vice versa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完全に玩具にされて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were completely made into their playthings."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「父や母や兄が殺されて私も発狂したところを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My father, mother, and brother were killed, and when I went mad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンク様に救って頂きました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kesselink saved me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう考えるとむしろラッキーだったかも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thinking about it that way, maybe I was actually lucky."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、みんな、似たようなものよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, everyone’s stories are sort of alike."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私達は皆、人間の世界で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We all have been subjected to cruel experiences in the human world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 非道い目に遭わされてきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We've suffered terrible things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エルシールは、元貴族の娘」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Elsir is a daughter of former nobility.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪党に家を没落させられて、領地の村で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her family was ruined by villains, and in the village of her domain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 共有財産の性奴隷として一年生き続けた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she lived for a year as shared property, a sex slave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バーバラは先天性の病気で体が上手く動かず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Barbara was born with a congenital illness and her body didn’t move well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家族に苛められ、体を売らされて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was bullied by her family and forced to sell her body..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでも恨まずに家族を愛していたけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, she loved her family without resentment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日冬の山に放置されて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but one day was left alone in a winter mountain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「動かぬ体を動かして家に帰れば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She moved her immobile body and returned home,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家族が温かい部屋で談笑していて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only to find her family laughing warmly inside the house..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのとき初めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At that moment, for the first time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界に絶望したって言ってたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she said she despaired of the world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ファーレンは奴隷として生きて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fahren lived as a slave,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動物と同じようなペット生活を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forced to live like a pet, just like an animal,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変態の貴族に強要されて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: by a perverted nobleman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ある日、処女を失うと死ぬ呪いを受けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One day, she was cursed to die if she lost her virginity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男装で男ばかりの学園に編入させられて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was forced to transfer in male disguise to an all-boys academy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何日まで無事でいられるかという、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She became the subject of a nasty noble bet about how many days she could survive,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴族のタチの悪い賭けの対象にされた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "a cruel game by the nobility."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リリムは狂った父親に人殺しの協力をさせられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lilim was forced by her mad father to assist in murder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分も気が狂いかけていた、だったかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she herself nearly went insane, I believe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「父親ではなくて叔父です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not her father, but her uncle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親が死んで預けられたんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her parents died and she was entrusted to him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、そうだった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, was that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「加奈代は武家の娘だったかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kanayo was a samurai family’s daughter, I think."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、尊敬していた姉がいたんですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, she had an older sister she respected,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉の婚約者が私に惚れていたみたいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but her sister’s fiancé seemed to have fallen for her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫉妬に狂った姉の罠にはめられました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she was trapped by her jealous sister’s scheme."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やってもいない罪で死刑待ち。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She was awaiting execution for a crime she didn’t commit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこをケッセルリンク様に救われたんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was saved by Lord Kesselink."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば、親の魔法実験と復讐の為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it, there was also a girl named Nagi who,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体をボロボロにされたナギなんて子もいたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: due to her parents’ magical experiments and revenge, had her body wrecked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「洗礼……使徒になる前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Baptism... before becoming an apostle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にかいなくなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she disappeared without anyone noticing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「使徒として、ケッセルリンク様の元で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Living as an apostle under Lord Kesselink,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生きた方が幸せになれるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would have made her happier..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう、シャロンさんは実は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, Sharon-san actually..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪党に家を没落させられて、領地の村で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her family was ruined by villains, and in the village of her domain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 共有財産の性奴隷として一年生き続けた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she lived for a year as shared property, a sex slave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バーバラは先天性の病気で体が上手く動かず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Barbara was born with a congenital illness and her body didn’t move well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家族に苛められ、体を売らされて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was bullied by her family and forced to sell her body..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでも恨まずに家族を愛していたけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, she loved her family without resentment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日冬の山に放置されて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but one day was left alone in a winter mountain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「動かぬ体を動かして家に帰れば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She moved her immobile body and returned home,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家族が温かい部屋で談笑していて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only to find her family laughing warmly inside the house..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのとき初めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At that moment, for the first time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界に絶望したって言ってたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she said she despaired of the world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ファーレンは奴隷として生きて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fahren lived as a slave,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動物と同じようなペット生活を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forced to live like a pet, just like an animal,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変態の貴族に強要されて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: by a perverted nobleman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ある日、処女を失うと死ぬ呪いを受けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One day, she was cursed to die if she lost her virginity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男装で男ばかりの学園に編入させられて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was forced to transfer in male disguise to an all-boys academy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何日まで無事でいられるかという、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She became the subject of a nasty noble bet about how many days she could survive,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴族のタチの悪い賭けの対象にされた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "a cruel game by the nobility."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リリムは狂った父親に人殺しの協力をさせられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lilim was forced by her mad father to assist in murder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分も気が狂いかけていた、だったかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she herself nearly went insane, I believe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「父親ではなくて叔父です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not her father, but her uncle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両親が死んで預けられたんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her parents died and she was entrusted to him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、そうだった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, was that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「加奈代は武家の娘だったかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kanayo was a samurai family’s daughter, I think."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、尊敬していた姉がいたんですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, she had an older sister she respected,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉の婚約者が私に惚れていたみたいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but her sister’s fiancé seemed to have fallen for her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫉妬に狂った姉の罠にはめられました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she was trapped by her jealous sister’s scheme."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やってもいない罪で死刑待ち。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She was awaiting execution for a crime she didn’t commit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこをケッセルリンク様に救われたんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was saved by Lord Kesselink."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば、親の魔法実験と復讐の為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it, there was also a girl named Nagi who,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体をボロボロにされたナギなんて子もいたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: due to her parents’ magical experiments and revenge, had her body wrecked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「洗礼……使徒になる前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Baptism... before becoming an apostle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にかいなくなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she disappeared without anyone noticing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「使徒として、ケッセルリンク様の元で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Living as an apostle under Lord Kesselink,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生きた方が幸せになれるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would have made her happier..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう、シャロンさんは実は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, Sharon-san actually..."
